# Python Plugin Performance Copilot

This plugin runs sar and pmlogger, collects data for the given amount of time,
and then generates a JSON output file of the results.

Build the container:
```
docker build . -t arcaflow-metadata-plugin
```

Run with the provided example input:
```
cat pcp_example.py | docker run -i --rm arcaflow-metadata-plugin -f -
```
# Autogenerated Input/Output Documentation by Arcaflow-Docsgen Below

<!-- Autogenerated documentation by arcaflow-docsgen -->
## Start PCP (`start-pcp`)

Start the PCP data logging tools

### Input

<tr><th>Type:</th><td><code>scope</code></td><tr><th>Root object:</th><td>PcpInputParams</td></tr>

                <table><tbody><tr><th>Name:</th><td>pmlogger logging interval</td></tr><tr><th>Description:</th><td>The logging interval in seconds used by pmlogger for data collection</td></tr><tr><th>Required:</th><td>No</td></tr><tr><th>Type:</th><td><code>int</code></td>
</tbody></table>
            </details></td></tr>
